== Kadakkal (628425) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kadakkal is a village in the [[Kottarakkara]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 2948 hectares and harbouring 8279 households with total population of 30719 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Punalur]] is at a distance of 25 km. Male population is 14110 and female population is 16609. Scheduled Caste Population is 3517 and Scheduled Tribes population is 130. Census Location Code of the village is 628425<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 26223 (85.36%)
* Literate male population: 12221 (86.61%)
* Literate female population: 14002 (84.3%)
